message: Restored some bio details with additional sourcing
/* External links */ Added link to New Republic author archive
Added/corrected biographical details. Added to bibliography. NPOV fixes on New Yorker allegation and subsequent investigations.
Compromise between last two editors. Get rid of any promo stuff and bad sources but keep neutral career highlights/lowlights.

Reverted [[WP:AGF|good faith]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/NPOV-Fixer|NPOV-Fixer]] ([[User talk:NPOV-Fixer|talk]]): These aren't really improvements. please get [[WP:CONSENSUS]] at talk. there are some poor sources (Hugh Hewitt and Emdashes) sourcing promotinal content, with some [[WP:OR]] thrown in.
